alert.note: Alert for Anson; Montgomery; Richmond; Stanly (North Carolina) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Severe Thunderstorm Warning issued May 23 at 1:44PM EDT until May 23 at 2:45PM EDT by NWS Raleigh
info.description: The National Weather Service in Raleigh has issued a * Severe Thunderstorm Warning for... Anson County in central North Carolina... Montgomery County in central North Carolina... Central Richmond County in central North Carolina... Stanly County in central North Carolina... * Until 245 PM EDT. * At 144 PM EDT, severe thunderstorms were located along a line extending from near Midland to near Sturdivants, moving northeast at 40 mph. HAZARD...60 mph wind gusts. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Expect damage to roofs, siding, and trees. * Locations impacted include... Albemarle, Rockingham, Wadesboro, Troy, Badin Lake, Hamlet, Ansonville, Plyler, Polkton and Locust. TORNADO...POSSIBLE HAIL THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX HAIL SIZE...<.75 IN WIND THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX WIND GUST...60 MPH
info.instruction: For your protection move to an interior room on the lowest floor of a building. To report severe weather, contact your nearest law enforcement agency. They will send your report to the National Weather Service office in Raleigh.
